title: The blog
body: This is where we are going to be updating you with the progression of the Gallery

title: Thank You
body: The website is live, if you're reading this, thank you very much for believing in this project as much as we do

title: What's Ahead?
body: We dont want to speak prematurely but we do have lot's of big things lined up for the near and far future. We will keep you updated as these plans progress. You will be the first to know

title: Membership launch
body: After lots of thorough testing we're pleased to be deploying the smart contract in the next few days. The first season will be starting soon.

title: Social Media
body: If you have not already find us on Instagram at , gooses.gallery, for updates on our work, as we sell more memberships we will be transfering to the blog and portfolio of the dashboard so that members only have access to our progression.
